Si on choisit quelqu'un qui a du cran, quelqu'un de profond, qui comprend la vie de tous les jours et qui est décidé à l'améliorer, si on choisit quelqu'un qui nous inspire, on sera capables d'affronter ce qui arrivera et d'accomplir des choses inimaginables.

If we choose someone with vision, someone with guts someone with gravitas who's connected to other people's lives and cares about making them better if we choose someone to inspire us then we'll be able to face what comes our way and achieve things we can't imagine yet.

And how everybody needs somebody to be inspired by.
